name: Freshbyte
description:
Freshbyte is a medium-size web and mobile development company based in Cluj-Napoca, Romania. Founded in 2007, Freshbyte has steadily grown and we now have ~80 IT professionals. We have delivered projects for a wide range of clients, from Inc 100 companies to small startups.
Our focus is establishing long-term partnerships with our clients, this way we can dive into their business, understand it and use technology to add value.
Core technologies
Our core competencies are PHP (Drupal, Magento, Wordpress, Symfony), native mobile development (iOS and Android), Frontend (HTML / CSS, Angular, React) and DevOps. We also have a Project management and a QA team to support the projects.
Services
Freshbyte's main service is web and mobile app development, with expertise in verticals like Travel, Loyalty, Health, E-Commerce. We can provide application support (including 24/7), DevOps and QA services. We also have experienced business analyst and technical architects.
And finally, why Cluj-Napoca?
Cluj-Napoca has two technical universities and it's a city with over 12,000 IT professionals. It has been named the "Silicon Valley" of Eastern Europe and "Most attractive growth pole in Romania" by KPMG. Cluj-Napoca is close to Western Europe or Middle East in time (GMT+2) and distance (2.5 hours flight to London or Paris). Big names are already in Cluj-Napoca: IBM, HP, Betfair, Emerson, Steelcase or Bombardier.
